ModMetaData.name: Minotaur Xenotype
ModMetaData.author: Snowcraft
ModMetaData.description:
Minotaurs are an anthropomorphic bovid xenotype based on the ancient mythologies of ancient Earth, an ancient species of cattle who's descendents populate the Rim.
Minotaurs are a cosmetic-only xenotype analogous to baseliners in terms of ability and strength; minotaurs will not outpower or outperform a baseline human in combat to any significant degree, nor bring any niche requirements to the table as members of a colony.
